name: Rush Hour Dungeon
description:
It sucks to be stuck in traffic. What about if you're also stuck into an endless dungeon?

How To Play

Left Arrow / Right Arrow - Slash your way through the Dungeon in the Rush Hour. Buy the displayed item in the shop.

Up Arrow / Down Arrow - Switch lanes. Enter or leave the shop.

Credits

Code, Art
@LostTrainDude

Music
@LizRainsberry - SoundCloud

Developer's sidenote

Mac version is untested! Please report here if you have issues running that!

This prototype was mostly developed during the last available weekend. It will receive small tweaks and fixes along the next few days, for balance's sake, along with more visual feedback (HP loss, XP and gold gained, etc.).

Feel free to comment below and give me your feedback!
